scripts.build: bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust && bun run build:python
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped - no rust directory'
scripts.build:python: test -d python && cd python && python3 -m build || echo 'Python build skipped - no python directory'
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.test:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo test || echo 'Rust tests skipped'
scripts.test:python: test -d python && cd python && pytest || echo 'Python tests skipped'
scripts.lint:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo clippy --all-targets -- -D warnings || echo 'Rust lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python: test -d python && cd python && ruff check . && ruff format --check . || echo 'Python lint skipped'
scripts.lint:python:fix: test -d python && cd python && ruff check --fix . && ruff format . || echo 'Python lint fix skipped'

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key ID used for authenticating requests to AWS S3.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret access key used for authenticating requests to AWS S3.

AWS_REGION.description: AWS region in which the S3 bucket resides.

AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: Name of the AWS S3 bucket used for file uploads and downloads.

AWS_S3_UPLOAD_PATH.description: Default path or prefix inside the S3 bucket where files will be uploaded.

AWS_S3_ENDPOINT.description: Custom S3-compatible endpoint (e.g., for non-AWS providers).

AWS_S3_SSL_ENABLED.description: Flag indicating whether SSL should be enabled for the custom S3 endpoint.

AWS_S3_FORCE_PATH_STYLE.description: Flag to force path-style addressing when connecting to the S3 endpoint.
